description.translate: Go with the one archere because she is our mother's chosen one.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Frère d'arme d'Amarianne\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Vas avec l'unique archère\"}","{\"text\":\"§7car elle est l'élue de notre mère.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Go with the one archere\"}","{\"text\":\"§7because she is our mother's chosen one.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a1 §7HER§a2 §7DAR§a2\"}"]}}
